type.name: org.gradle.play.tasks.TwirlCompile
type.description: Task for compiling Twirl templates into Scala code.

method.name: getDefaultImports
method.description:
Returns the default imports that will be used when compiling templates.

returns:The imports that will be used.

method.name: getForkOptions
method.description: fork options for the twirl compiler.

method.name: getOutputDirectory
method.description:
Returns the directory to generate the parser source files into.

returns:The output directory.

method.name: getToolChain
method.description:
Returns the tool chain that will be used to compile the twirl source.

returns:The tool chain.

method.name: setDefaultImports
method.description:
Sets the default imports to be used when compiling templates.
param:defaultImports The imports to be used.

method.name: setOutputDirectory
method.description:
Specifies the directory to generate the parser source files into.
param:outputDirectory The output directory. Must not be null.

method.name: setToolChain
method.description:
Sets the tool chain that will be used to compile the twirl source.
param:toolChain The tool chain.

property.name: defaultImports
property.description:
Returns the default imports that will be used when compiling templates.

returns:The imports that will be used.

property.name: forkOptions
property.description: fork options for the twirl compiler.

property.name: outputDirectory
property.description:
Returns the directory to generate the parser source files into.

returns:The output directory.

property.name: toolChain
property.description:
Returns the tool chain that will be used to compile the twirl source.

returns:The tool chain.
